main.name: Kritika Verma
main.description: B. Tech. Graduate | Strong analytical and quantitative skills | Ability to analyze patterns and trends in large data sets | Knowledge of Data Mining and Data Warehouse | Sound understanding of Database and SQL queries
main.bio: Good logical and interpersonal skills. Having background in Computer Science. With an experience of 1 year in IT industry. Working experience in differents tools like SQL server, Threekit, Git. Having fundamental knowledge in Data Structure, Algorithms, OOPS, DBMS, Operating Systems.

testimonials.text: Here you should write some nice things that someone has said about you. No lies though, employers can tell when you are lying.

That Tim Baker must be one of the most brilliant developers I've ever met! It is amazing that nobody has hired him yet. Hey you, you should hire this guy, he may be fresh out of University and have zero on the job experience but I am confident that he will be one of your best developers in no time!
